discoverTheInformationOfYourText: discover the information of your text (sentiments, key phrases and more), with text analysis
enterAContext: enter a Context (social media post, feedback, review, etc.)
keyPhrasesAndNumberOfTimesInTheText: key phrases and number of times in the text
orEnterTheTextYoWishToBeAnalyzed: or enter the text you wish to be analyzed
selectOrDragTextFile: select or drag a text file
whatDoYouLikeAboutTheApp: what do you like about the app?
whatCanBeImprovedInTheApp: what can be improved in the app?
